nodes.bodyText:
@parsharma This line was removed from this file in other work recently and I think this line probably crept back in during a merge or rebase or something. I don't see anything in the rest of the PR that would require it so I suspect it wasn't intentionally part of this commit.
I believe removing this will allow this PR to build. If you do that and the PR passes CI please ping me in chat so I can make sure it gets merged.
